magicbook.gui
Class DropBoxTool

java.lang.Object
  magicbook.material.Observable
      magicbook.gui.DropBoxTool

public class DropBoxTool
extends Observable

This Tool provides a dropbox where the user can drop files or urls into, to link them to mediums they create with the addmediumtool.

Author:
edzweistein

Constructor Summary
DropBoxTool()
           
 
Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clears the set of droppedFiles and JTextArea of the ui.
 boolean existsDroppedFiles()
          Returns whether files habe been dropped to the dropbox.
 java.io.File getCoverArt()
          Returns the coverart for this medium, should only be called
 Type getDroppedMediumType()
          This method returns the type of the medium which was dropped, so that the ui can respond to this and change its "questions"
 java.util.HashSet<java.io.File> getFiles()
          Returns all files which are relevant for this medium
 DropBoxUI getUI()
          Returns the ui.
 javax.swing.JPanel getUIPanel()
          Returns the UI panel for this tool.
 void setCoverArtDropMode()
          Changes the mode of the ui to ONLY enable a cover to be dropped
 void setDropMediumMode()
          Changes the mode of the ui to enable media files to be dropped
